meanings.definition: In a manner that exceeds normal limits or expectations.
meanings.sent1: She ran supernormally fast, leaving everyone behind.
meanings.sent2: He completed the race supernormally quickly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel supernormally gathered all the nuts in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her intelligence shone supernormally bright in the class.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's strength was supernormally powerful, able to lift cars effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Beyond what is considered typical or usual.
meanings.sent1: The supernormally large pumpkin won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent2: She had a supernormally high IQ compared to her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The cat's supernormally fluffy tail was the talk of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The supernormally quiet library suddenly erupted in noise.
meanings.sent5: The supernormally bright colors of the sunset painted the sky in a breathtaking display.
